long_description: the fourth, interactive news portal is the first venture from times square communications pvt ltd in this time of ‘post truth’ these media outlets seek to reinvent the ethical journalism by sticking to fact based reporting. we the fourth have unflinching commitment to the constitution of india and imbibe constitutional values. our team is handpicked for their impeccable integrity. we are not a studio centred news outlet but rather driven by people’s hopes, and their struggle for a better life. the fourth has no affiliation with any political ideology or special interest group or any religious groups. our commitment is to the people and the constitutional values of this country
